name: Run And Gun (ApricotWTF)
description:
Beat the boss before his blocks push you off into oblivion.

Simple shooter, designed as a proof of concept for as a possible direction for a boss fight based FPS game designed to navigate and dodge incoming objects.

Classic WASD and arrow controls. Recommend WASD

Forward - W

Back -S

Left-A

Right- D

Jump- Spacebar

Slowmo - Z 

Use mouse to aim and shoot with left trigger
